SharpClaws/Aelo/Celeno/Ocipite::

Sharpclaws::

"We have to go a battle..."

Aelo/Celeno/Ocipite::

Aelo: we think that regarding Scorponok's condition, he shouldn't go 
by now...
Celeno: He needs rest...
Ocipite: Maybe a cr...

Aelo/Celeno/Ocipite: We must go our base and check his wounds 
before.You can said to Darkfate that we have to attend a new member 
of our team...

Sharpclaws sighed "Okey... Deepfear, Charon, Underground... Go to 
battle; the ladies and us will go to base. Tell to Darkfate that I'll 
go soon"

Sharpclaws ran towards a tunnel followed by Aelo, celeno and Ocipite 
and the other moles went to battle
